columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREMIUM_RATE_EFF_DT
columns.description: Stores the effective date of the coverage level premium rate.

columns.name: PREMIUM_RATE
columns.description: Stores the coverage level override premium rate.

columns.name: PREMIUM_RT_TERM_DT
columns.description: Stores the term date of the coverage level premium rate

columns.name: HIX_APTC_AMT
columns.description: Stores the Advance Premium Tax Credit amount.

columns.name: HIX_CSR_AMT
columns.description: Stores the Cost Sharing Reduction amount of an exchange coverage.

columns.name: HIX_OTHER_AMT
columns.description: The payment amount for an exchange coverage from a federally recognized tribe.

columns.name: HIX_EMPLOYER_AMT
columns.description: Stores the employer responsibility amount for an exchange coverage.

columns.name: HIX_RESP_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total responsibility amount for an exchange coverage.

columns.name: HIX_STATE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The payment amount for an exchange coverage from the state

columns.name: MCARE_PART_C_PREM
columns.description: This column stores the amount for the Part C premium, which is used for Medicare Advantage coverages.

columns.name: MCARE_PART_D_PREM
columns.description: This column stores the amount for the Part D premium. This value is compared to the Part D premium amount on the employer group during premium computation. This value isn't directly used for billing. The adjusted Part D premium (CVG-18838), which is used for billing, is calculated using this amount.

columns.name: MCARE_LATE_ENRL_PEN
columns.description: This column holds the amount for Part D Late Enrollment Penalty (LEP), which is used for some Medicare Advantage coverages.

columns.name: MCARE_LIS_PART_D
columns.description: This column holds the Low Income Subsidy (LIS) amount for Part D on Medicare Advantage coverages.

columns.name: MCARE_LIS_FOR_LEP
columns.description: This column holds the Low Income Subsidy (LIS) for Late Enrollment Penalty (LEP); this is only used for Medicare Advantage coverages.

columns.name: MCARE_LEP_WAIVED
columns.description: This column holds the amount of waived Late Enrollment Penalty (LEP) for Medicare Advantage coverages.

columns.name: MCARE_ADJ_LEP
columns.description: This column holds the adjusted Late Enrollment Penalty. The Low Income Subsidy for Late Enrollment Penalty (CVG-18835) and the Late Enrollment Penalty Waived (CVG-18836) are each subtracted from the Late Enrollment Penalty (CVG-18833) to arrive at this amount. This amount will then be billed to the member.

columns.name: MCARE_ADJ_PART_D
columns.description: This column holds the adjusted Part D premium. The Low Income Subsidy for Part D (CVG-18834) is subtracted from the Part D premium (CVG-18832) to arrive at this amount.

columns.name: HIX_NON_HYDE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The non-Hyde credit amount for an exchange coverage.
